data.name: Understanding Consumer Behaviour: How it helps Marketers, Product Managers & Designers
data.summary:
What you'll learn at this meetup?
Understanding how humans behave & why they do what they do
Creating frameworks to explain human psychology better to your team
Building products & marketing them based on real behaviours
data.speakers:
Preeti KS, Behavioural Science Lead at Grab Singapore

She has set up the behavioural practice at Grab from scratch, helping product and design teams understand customer behaviour and build better products.
Preeti has been a part of various consumer facing product features, such as fare alert, fare communication, driver app, subscriptions.
Prior to this, she co-founded and set up a company within the Mahindra Group
